duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing preventative maintenance and minor repairs on a fleet of vehicles to ensure they are safe and in good working condition.
Using tools and technology to log, research, and complete repairs, including vehicle diagnostics and component maintenance.
Partnering with supervisors for on-the-job coaching and technician training to learn advanced vehicle maintenance processes.
Completing assigned projects and tasks as directed by the supervisor.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent preferred; vocational or technical certification in vehicle repair preferred (Associate's degree preferred)
